project_abstract.cdata: The Water Supply and Sanitation Rehabilitation Project seeks to contribute to improved public health and sector management by (i) rehabilitating and extending water supply systems in the Amparai, Anuradhaura and Colombo areas; (ii) rehabilitating sewerage, sanitation and drainage systems in the Colombo area; (iii) strengthening the National Water Supply and Drainage Board's (WDB) project and financial management and enhancing its operations and maintenance capacity; and (iv) providing technical assistance, training and vehicles.
